param.name: infile_input
param.label: Select input data file :
param.help: Input data is a matrix (tabular) where each column is a feature and the last column contains the target values.

param.name: infile_output
param.label: Select predicted data file :
param.help: Predicted data is a matrix (tabular) where each column is a feature and the last column contains the predicted values.

data.name: output_actual_vs_pred
data.label: Actual vs predicted curves of tabular data on ${on_string}

data.name: output_scatter_plot

tool.help:
**What it does**
Produce a `line curves <https://plot.ly/python/heatmaps/>`_ from tabular files. The input data contains the original/true values (last column) and the predicted data contains the predicted values (last column). The true and predicted values are plotted against each other. The plot is buried in a html file which provides rich interactive features. Image can be saved in various format, such as 'png', 'svg', 'jpeg' and so on.
